amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 13 of the bill which is a clarification of whistleblower rights relating to scientific and other research.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 110-48 to remove the provision that would make influencing federally funded scientific research a prohibited personnel practice.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sali amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 159 - 271 (Roll no. 150).
